findings.title: Timestamp Dependence
findings.description: Inclusion of Functionality from Untrusted Control Sphere

findings.title: Authorization through tx.origin
findings.description: The authorization mechanism relies on tx.origin, which can be manipulated by attackers.

findings.title: Transaction Order Dependence
findings.description: CWE-362: Concurrent Execution using Shared Resource with Improper Synchronization (Race Condition)

findings.title: DoS with Failed Call
findings.description: Improper Check or Handling of Exceptional Conditions

findings.title: Delegatecall to Untrusted Callee
findings.description: The contract makes a delegatecall to an untrusted callee, which can lead to unauthorized access and manipulation of the contract's state.

findings.title: Use of Deprecated Solidity Functions
findings.description: The contract uses outdated compiler version which may lead to known vulnerabilities.

findings.title: Unprotected SELFDESTRUCT Instruction
findings.description: The contract contains an unprotected SELFDESTRUCT instruction, which can lead to unauthorized destruction of the contract.

findings.title: Unprotected Ether Withdrawal
findings.description: Improper Access Control allowing unauthorized ether withdrawal.

findings.title: Unchecked Call Return Value
findings.description: The return value of a call is not checked, which can lead to unexpected behavior.

findings.title: Floating Pragma
findings.description: The pragma version is not fixed, which can lead to unexpected behavior when compiling with a different Solidity version.
